description:
Now that Koga has given himself to the dark side, will his friends be able to stop him and the Four Kings of Mars? 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For My Friends! Koga`s Hidden Power!
Nakama no Tame ni! Kouga ni Himerareshi Chikara!
Pour mes compagnons ! La force cachée de Koga !
仲間のために! 光牙に秘められし力!
